title: Serif Italic - Can't figure it out
content:
I'm rebuilding (and doing some redesign) on this logo for a company, and cannot figure out what the font is. This is the best version of the film they have, which makes it even harder to ID through What's My Font or similar.

Anyone have a clue?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214027/http:/typophile.com/files/logo5.jpg) | 21.71 KB |
author: qmanning

comments.content: FYI, for anyone curious, it seems to be ITC Stone Serif. The & is from something else, but the rest seems to be pretty durn close.
